body: font-family: Geneva, 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #555; background-color: #FCFCFC; max-width: 750px; margin: 0 auto; padding: 15px;
h3: font-family: Trebuchet, sans-serir; color: #FAFAFA; background-color: #85D22F; padding: 3px;
alert: margin-bottom: 1em; text-align: center; padding: 1em; border: 1px solid #85d22f; border-radius: 5px; color: white; background-color: #85D22F
table: width: 100%; border-collapse: collapse; background-color: #FFF; color: #555; font-size: 0.9em;
thead: color: white; font-weight: bold; padding: 5px; background-color: #81d4fa
btn: background: #007BFF; padding: 10px; color: white; text-decoration: none; border: 1px solid #007BFF; border-radius: 5px;
